George Zepeda
=============

George Zepeda, Councilor, District 4
------------------------------------

Term Ends: May 2026
[Email George Zepeda](mailto:gzepeda@rosenbergtx.gov)
832-595-3340

Councilor George Zepeda was elected to the office of City Councilor, District 4 in May 2022 and again on May 4, 2024. Â He has lived in Rosenberg for over 40 years, has been married for 53 years, has two children and a third-generation grandpa.
